name: Lazy Postman
description:
Technological progress does not stand still, and now couriers and postmen have begun to be replaced by soulless delivery drones. But humanity must not give up in the struggle for jobs! Help the poor fellows deliver mail on time or they will lose their jobs!

Lazy Postman is a top-down 3D runner in which you have not one, or even two, but a dozen main characters that spend all their energy trying to stay at their job. Help couriers not to lose their means of subsistence and prove that a human is better than a robot!

Game features:
- Addictive gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Many main characters
- Endless level
